feedbackForPerfect: Correct! The rocky planets are Earth, Mercury, Venus, and Mars. Jupiter, Neptune, Saturn, and Uranus are all gas giants. Titan isn't a planet, it's a moon!
feedbackForImperfect: Not quite! The rocky planets are Earth, Mercury, Venus, and Mars. Jupiter, Neptune, Saturn, and Uranus are all gas giants. Titan isn't a planet, it's a moon!
